headline: Robert Kiyosaki slams Buffett’s take on crypto even as Bitcoin wipes out $400B in 1 week. Is it time to buy or bail?
summary: Digital gold or rat poison? It depends on who you ask.

headline: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (HOOD) Affirms Robust Growth as Citizens Asserts Outperform Rating
summary: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) is one of the best cryptocurrency stocks to buy for the long term. On November 13, Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) reiterated that it is in a phase of robust growth, announcing a 115% year-over-year increase in the value of total platform assets to $343 billion. The 3% increase in total platform […]

headline: Citizens Remains Bullish on Robinhood Markets (HOOD) Amid Leadership Changes
summary: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) is included in our list of the best crypto-related stocks to invest in. On November 13, 2025, Citizens reiterated its “Market Outperform” rating on Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) with a $180 price target. The investment firm believes the transition from CFO Jason Warnick to the new CFO Shiv Verma will maintain […]
